text:
Had a great experience at Gleneagles Hospital. The service was excellent, and all the staff were very friendly and professional. Special thanks to Dr. Suheab from the Orthopaedics department—truly one of the best doctors I’ve ever met. He is very experienced and professional, explained everything clearly, and made me feel at ease throughout the treatment. I highly recommend him to anyone facing orthopaedic issues—you’re definitely in good hands!

Also want to highlight Cik Faizatul, who provided amazing service with such a friendly attitude. Thank you to the whole team for the great experience!

I had an excellent experience at this hospital. The staff were incredibly professional, caring, and attentive from the moment I walked in. The doctors explained everything clearly and made sure I was comfortable throughout my stay. The facilities were clean, modern, and well-equipped. I truly felt like I was in good hands. Thank you to everyone who made my recovery smooth and stress-free. Highly recommended!

I had an excellent experience at this hospital. Dr. Tang, she was very professional and provided clear explanations about my condition and the operation plan. The nurses were also very friendly and careful, making the whole experience reassuring and pleasant.
Parking is also hassle-free, with free parking available and a shuttle car service that takes you from the parking lot to the hospital entrance.
A heartfelt thank you to all the staff for the excellent care and service.
The best Gleneagles in malaysia, it provides us foreigner with international lounge service with free flow of foods and beverages. Also kids can stay in the lounge with out feeling bored.

I had an exceptional experience at Gleneagles Hospital Johor. The staff was kind, attentive, and professional. The doctors and nurses provided excellent care and informed every step of the way. Kudos to the International Lounge & Ward 4A for the warm welcome & amazing hospitality, making the entire procedures to be much effortless & easier for us.

I’m incredibly grateful for the quality of care I received and would highly recommend this hospital to anyone!
